description: Research essay on assigned vision science topic requiring critical analysis of research papers (max 2500 words). Includes use of generative AI with documentation requirements.

Two-part laboratory report involving conducting experiments, statistical analysis, and communication of findings. Part 1: Research critique (Week 4). Part 2: Data analysis report (Week 10). Requires AI use documentation.
2-hour centrally invigilated exam testing understanding of all course topics including spatial vision, colour processing, motion perception, and visual system organization.
